Title: Relates to requiring certain vehicles to be equipped with an ignition interlock device
Summary: Requires certain vehicles to be equipped with an ignition interlock device, including vehicles transporting hazardous materials, commercial vehicles over 18,000 pounds, and public mass transportation vehicles.
LawCode: Add ยง379, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring certain vehicles to be equipped with ignition interlock devices
